creator: mchassagneux@apache.org
text:
The new timeShift function use only the locale JMeter one to format date.
I think it's better to separate the JMeter locale and the function in order to be more flexible. 
Example :
A date can be display en english and JMeter can be in french.
A ThreadGroup can shift a date and display the result in english and an other in spanish.
etc..

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
